# go-bitfield

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/made%20by-Protocol%20Labs-blue.svg?style=flat-square)](http://ipn.io)
[![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/filecoin-project/go-bitfield.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/filecoin-project/go-bitfield)
[![standard-readme compliant](https://img.shields.io/badge/standard--readme-OK-green.svg?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/RichardLitt/standard-readme)

> Advanced RLE+ implementation

Features iterator based primitives that scale with number of runs instead of number of bits.
